setprefix.name: setprefix
setprefix.info: Changes the prefix I listen to for this server. [ADMIN]

nuke.name: nuke
nuke.info: Deletes a certain number of past messages. [MOD]

cleanse.name: cleanse
cleanse.info: Deletes a certain number of past bot related message. [MOD]

setwelcome.name: setwelcome
setwelcome.info: Changes the channel I send welcome messages in. [MOD]

setlogs.name: setlogs
setlogs.info: Changes the channel I log events to. [MOD]

echo.name: echo
echo.info: Sends a custom message to a channel. [MOD]

ignore.name: ignore
ignore.info: Ignores all conversation and commands from a user. [MOD]

pfp.name: pfp
pfp.info: Fetches the profile picture of the user.

ch.name: ch
ch.info: Sends a random Cyanide and Happiness comic.

serverinfo.name: serverinfo
serverinfo.info: Lists information about the current server.

uptime.name: uptime
uptime.info: Show the amount I've gone since my last restart.

source.name: source
source.info: Sends my source code on github.
